sn1.79:1: "Kiṁsu bandhati pātheyyaṁ,kiṁsu bhogānamāsayo;Kiṁsu naraṁ parikassati,kiṁsu lokasmi dujjahaṁ;Kismiṁ baddhā puthū sattā,pāsena sakuṇī yathā"ti.
sn1.79:2: "Saddhā bandhati pātheyyaṁ,sirī bhogānamāsayo;Icchā naraṁ parikassati,icchā lokasmi dujjahā;Icchābaddhā puthū sattā,pāsena sakuṇī yathā"ti.
